availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward R. Wilson (Allen County, Indiana, judge)

body.p: Allen County, Indiana, judge. Fairfield County, Ohio, native. Married to Electa Case Wilson. Father of Charles Wilson, James L. Wilson, and Emma C. Wilson. Judge of the Allen County Circuit Court from 1858 to 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Wells County, Bluffton, p. 940.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Indiana, Jefferson County, Madison, p. 348B.
